text:
Give me a UNIX command to remove all of these files

src/ui/components/Error/Error.tsx
	src/ui/components/Error/index.ts
	src/ui/components/Finalize/Finalize.test.tsx
	src/ui/components/Finalize/Finalize.tsx
	src/ui/components/Finalize/index.ts
	
To remove all of these files in UNIX, you can use the `rm` command followed by the file paths:

```
rm src/ui/components/Error/Error.tsx \
src/ui/components/Error/index.ts \
src/ui/components/Finalize/Finalize.test.tsx \
src/ui/components/Finalize/Finalize.tsx \
src/ui/components/Finalize/index.ts
```

This command will delete the specified files from the file system. Please double-check the file paths before executing the command to avoid accidentally deleting any important files.
summary: Remove all files using a UNIX command
